mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flowtask_notification ( notification_id, recipient_no, sender_no, notification_type, title, message, team_id, column_id, task_id, is_read, created_at ) VALUES ( nextval('flowtask_notification_seq'), #{recipientNo}, #{senderNo}, #{notificationType}, #{title}, #{message}, #{teamId}, #{columnId}, #{taskId}, false, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE flowtask_notification SET is_read = true WHERE recipient_no = #{recipientNo} AND is_read = false
mapper.select: SELECT n.*, s.name as sender_name, s.userid as sender_userid, t.team_name, c.title as column_title, tk.title as task_title FROM flowtask_notification n LEFT JOIN flowtask_member s ON n.sender_no = s.no LEFT JOIN flowtask_team t ON n.team_id = t.team_id LEFT JOIN flowtask_column c ON n.column_id = c.column_id LEFT JOIN flowtask_task tk ON n.task_id = tk.task_id WHERE n.notification_id = #{notificationId}

SELECT n.*, s.name as sender_name, s.userid as sender_userid, t.team_name, c.title as column_title, tk.title as task_title FROM flowtask_notification n LEFT JOIN flowtask_member s ON n.sender_no = s.no LEFT JOIN flowtask_team t ON n.team_id = t.team_id LEFT JOIN flowtask_column c ON n.column_id = c.column_id LEFT JOIN flowtask_task tk ON n.task_id = tk.task_id WHERE n.recipient_no = #{recipientNo} ORDER BY n.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
